channel.title: Read Articles Podcast
channel.description: AI-generated audio versions of interesting articles using Kokoro TTS
channel.itunes:author: Read Articles
channel.itunes:summary: AI-generated audio versions of interesting articles using Kokoro TTS

item.title: What Are People Still Doing on X? - The Atlantic (Santa Voice)
item.description: An exploration of why people continue to use X (formerly Twitter) despite its controversies. Read by AI voice: am_santa
item.itunes:author: The Atlantic (AI Narrated)
item.itunes:subtitle: Why people still use X despite controversies
item.itunes:summary: An exploration of why people continue to use X (formerly Twitter) despite its controversies, exploring the psychological and social factors that keep users engaged with the platform. Narrated by AI voice am_santa.
